author: James Vugteveen

review: This device works about 50% of the time.  When it works, it's great, obviously.  There is no clear reason why half the time it doesn't work.  Internet connection will show as excellent, and I'll be able to get on Netflix, HBO GO etc just fine, yet none of the apps work via Roku.  This is after resetting Netflix on the Roku and resetting Roku itself.  I recently gave up and connected my laptop to my TV with an HDMI cable to watch Netflix.  THAT worked perfectly.  It's just cheap and unreliable and I would not recommend it to anyone.
